channel.title: SFoL Golden Dragon III — Return of the Queen Discussion and Balance Thread
channel.description:
Hi Does anyone have any thought about how the setup could or should be improved from golden dragon 2?
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-33-the-golden-dragon-2-golden-dragon-diseased-and-neutral-queen-win/72129
Also it would be great to get a co-host
thank you!

item.title: SFoL Golden Dragon III — Return of the Queen Discussion and Balance Thread
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
im also seeking a co-designer for SCP FM 2 if anyone is familiar with that lore, since Geyde had to step away from that

i’d like SCP FM 1 to get a worthy successor eventually. that one was still the most magical experience i’ve ever had playing on this site so far.

Read full topic
item.source: SFoL Golden Dragon III — Return of the Queen Discussion and Balance Thread

item.title: SFoL Golden Dragon III — Return of the Queen Discussion and Balance Thread
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
does anyone want to try to help me balance this for the modern era?
if not, it goes to the trash can.
since i’ve learned the hard way that im incompetent at balancing things myself without a co-designer.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL Golden Dragon III — Return of the Queen Discussion and Balance Thread
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
Town was playing fairly rationally that game.

You had people analyzing wagons, discussing reads, forming PoEs, very little mech-solving, nobody was hero-shooting outside of Marg.

item.description:

This is happening every two or three games now.

item.description:
Pretty much, but that was one of the few large-scale games that was hosted in 2018.

I mean, in 2018 we also had abominations like TT2, but games like those are basically the norm nowadays.

item.source: SFoL Golden Dragon III — Return of the Queen Discussion and Balance Thread

item.title: SFoL Golden Dragon III — Return of the Queen Discussion and Balance Thread
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
Chloe:

There’s less of a push for town cohesion here and now everyone does whatever the hell they want nowadays.

And yes, people being idiots with KP is a major pet peeve that I have.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
I mean, compare how people handled ITAs in FEFates versus Anime or JJBA.

There’s less of a push for town cohesion here and now everyone does whatever the hell they want nowadays.

item.source: SFoL Golden Dragon III — Return of the Queen Discussion and Balance Thread

item.title: SFoL Golden Dragon III — Return of the Queen Discussion and Balance Thread
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
Like, the worst large-scale town game then I’d say was probably Overwatch, and they lost because a villager got modkilled for game integrity-related reasons at MyLo and would have won had not that issue happened. In other matches like Ace Attorney or FEFates were decisive town victories.

Here lately every damn large-scale game has been a wolf win.

Read full topic
